title: Upstairs, 2bed 2bath, Stainless steel aps, Plank flooring, pool & more
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Welcome home to Park Vue Apartments.', "We are centrally located in the heart of Santa Rosa, Ca and conveniently located near some of the city's best nightlife, restaurants, and entertainment.", "Although, our community offers a tucked away feel, we're just moments away from all that Santa Rosa has to offer including top-notch restaurants, endless entertainment, choice shopping and plenty of outdoor recreation opportunities.", 'At Park Vue Apartments we invite you to come write your own definition of luxury in any of our premier 1, 2, and 3 bedroom floor plans.', 'We offer an unmatched combination of style, location, and amenities at Park Vue Apartments, and we think you will agree.', 'We realize that when you come home, your personal time is your most precious resource.', 'Park Vue Apartments offers many ways to connect, relax and recharge so that you can make the most of your time at home.', 'We strive to create environments to help you recharge.', 'Park Vue offers the little touches to help you relax including a refreshing pool and spa, and a business center with free wifi.', "The personal accents are what we're most proud of, and we hope you'll appreciate the little things just as much as the big.", 'Welcome home!', 'Schedule a virtual tour today and see for yourself what makes us one of the top apartment communities in Santa Rosa!', 'Take a look at our website and apply here: <URL>/', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 8, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Max 2 allowed  Max weight 50lb each  Rent $50.00 each  Deposit $500.00Restrictions: Breed restrictions do apply.', 'Deposit:', '$500 minimum', 'Leasing options:', '12 months,12+ months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Currently offering 10-13 month leases and not offering in-person tours.', 'Please reach out to us in regards to pictures and video tour options.', 'Application fee:', '$55.80 per applicant', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Water, Sewage, Garbage', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Varies (paid by resident)', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit, Shared', 'Parking type:', 'Covered', 'Parking notes:',
